problem.markdown:
>>Mathematically, what does Goldratt mean by "dependent events"?<<
( ) Some events are dependant random variables (x) The requirement that certain things be non-negative (like inventory). ( ) Some events can only happen if other events happen.

multiplechoiceresponse.label: Mathematically, what does Goldratt mean by "dependent events"?

choicegroup.choice: Some events are dependant random variables
The requirement that certain things be non-negative (like inventory).
Some events can only happen if other events happen.
